meanings.definition: Occurring or discovered by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
meanings.sent1: The serendipitously found treasure brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: She stumbled upon a serendipitously perfect gift for her friend.
meanings.sent3: The serendipitously sunny weather made their picnic even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His serendipitously timed arrival saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The serendipitously blooming flowers painted a beautiful scene.

meanings.definition: Happening or discovered unexpectedly and fortuitously.
meanings.sent1: Their serendipitously meeting at the cafe led to a great friendship.
meanings.sent2: The serendipitously discovered shortcut saved them a lot of time.
meanings.sent3: The serendipitously empty parking spot was like a gift from above.
meanings.sent4: Her serendipitously chosen lottery numbers won her a prize.
meanings.sent5: The serendipitously timed train arrival made him catch his flight.
